description: The Arcane Outcast is a rogue magic-user, exiled from a powerful wizard's guild for forbidden experiments. They wander the wilderness, shunned by society but feared for their unpredictable magic.

traits.name: Unstable Magic
traits.description: When the Arcane Outcast casts a spell, roll a d20. On a roll of 1, the spell backfires, dealing 1d6 force damage to the Outcast.

actions.name: Arcane Bolt
actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) force damage.

actions.name: Minor Illusion
actions.description: The Arcane Outcast can cast the Minor Illusion cantrip at will.
